author: Han
content: Bullish: Google is way too undervalued. I just loaded 1100 shares and plan to hold until my retirement. Thanks Google.

author: Dr
content: Buy this stock before the next president assumes the duty. This will be the last opportunity.

author: Terminal Gravity
content: Bullish: Love the articles that are coming out saying to ignore the noise and load up. DOJ's request for GOOG to sell Chrome won't stand up and is basically just a wish list item. Compared to peers, GOOG is 50% undervalued. Accumulating.

author: Wswolf
content: Bearish: High risk for antitrust action not priced in yet
